tool.name: BART prediction of EI-MS spectra
tool.command: . /opt/conda/bin/activate && conda activate BARTpredictCPU && rm -rf model out && mkdir -p model && unzip -d model $model && sed 's?__DATA_PATH__?$spectra?' $__tool_directory__/config.yml.template >config.yml && python3 /opt/spectrum/predict.py --checkpoint model --config-file config.yml --output-folder out && mv out/tiny/*/predictions.jsonl $predictions
